episodes.title: La Familia Michoacana: The Cartel That Turned Into a Cult
episodes.description:
🔍 In this true crime documentary, we dive into the rise and fall of La Familia Michoacana, the Mexican cartel that turned into a cult. From their rise in Michoacán to their violent clashes with Los Zetas and their alliance with El Chapo’s Sinaloa Cartel, we reveal how they built a criminal empire fueled by faith and fear.

💰 Explore how the cartel dominated m*th production, invented the practice of extortion, and imposed its own tax-like system on local businesses, tightening its grip on entire communities.

📖 Discover the disturbing ideology of Nazario Moreno, alias “El Más Loco” or "El Chayo" and his cartel bible, where recruits were baptized not with water but with the blood of their first victim, transforming La Familia into one of the most cult-like cartels in history.

🧠 Learn how religion, violence, and organized crime fused together to create a double-faced organization that preached family values while terrorizing the very people it claimed to protect.

📲 Subscribe to Informe Secreto for exclusive documentaries on cartel history and the hidden world of organized crime.

⚠️ This video is for informational and documentary purposes only. Some scenes are fictional reenactments taken from audiovisual productions and do not depict real events.

🎵 Music: Crime is Everywhere by Soundridemusic
